resources.string: Dallas BBQ is a restaurant style grill, specializing in Western Style Foods such as steaks, ribs, shrimp, fish, burgers, and wings. Prices are relatively high however food portions are large, finnishing one plate is an accomplishment.

McDonald's primarily sells hamburgers, cheeseburgers, chicken products, french fries, breakfast items, soft drinks, milkshakes, and desserts. In response to changing consumer tastes, the company has expanded its menu to include salads, fish, wraps, smoothies and fruit.
Macy's is a large department store with a variety of products for both men and women such as clothing, accessories, and cosmetics.
GameStop is a video game store selling, video games, video game consoles, controllers, merchandise, and gift cards.
